mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into registration (address, age, birthday, consultation_date, id_number, medicial_certificate_number, medicial_category, patient_name, outpatient_doctor_id, registration_department_id, settlement_category_id, registration_category, `status`, cost ) values (#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consultationDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicialCertificateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicialCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outpatientDoctorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registrationDepartmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{settlementCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registrationCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cost,jdbcType=REAL} )
mapper.update: update registration set address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consultation_date = #{consultationDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_number = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicial_certificate_number = #{medicialCertificateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicial_category = #{medicialCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patient_name = #{patientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outpatient_doctor_id = #{outpatientDoctorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, registration_department_id = #{registrationDepartmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, settlement_category_id = #{settlementCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, registration_category = #{registrationCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=REAL} where medical_record_id = #{medicalRecordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select medical_record_id, address, age, birthday, consultation_date, id_number, medicial_certificate_number, medicial_category, patient_name, outpatient_doctor_id, registration_department_id, settlement_category_id, registration_category, `status`, cost from registration where medical_record_id = #{medicalRecordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
